AJD Moment Derivation¶

AJD: Affine Jump Diffusion —————————– ajdmom (AJD moments) Release v1.0

AJDmom is a Python Package for auto-deriving moment and covariance formulas of some AJD processes, such as the well-known Heston SV model and its AJD extensions.
